text: Trial participants were randomised 1:1 to exercise or control groups after baseline assessments. We used a computer random number generator developed and administrated at the Unit for Applied Clinical Research at NTNU to generate the random allocation sequence, as previously detailed [26] .
sentences: Trial participants were randomised 1:1 to exercise or control groups after baseline assessments.
We used a computer random number generator developed and administrated at the Unit for Applied Clinical Research at NTNU to generate the random allocation sequence, as previously detailed [26] .
